fields.title: A list of fields which should be selected from the items
fields.description:
A list of fields which should be selected from the items, only these fields will remain in the resulting record objects.

 For example, when using the website content crawler, you might select fields such as `text` and `url`, and `metadata.title` among others, to be included in the vector store file.

metadata_fields.title: Metadata fields
metadata_fields.description:
A list of fields which should be selected from the items and stored as metadata. 

 For example, when using the website content crawler, you might want to store `url` in metadata. In this case, use `metadata_fields parameter as follows {"page_url": "url"}`

metadata_values.title: Metadata values
metadata_values.description:
Custom values to be stored for every Dataset item as metadata.

 For example, you might want to store `domain` in metadata, hence use `metadata_values as {"domain": "apify.com"}`

perform_chunking.title: Perform chunking
perform_chunking.description: If set to true, the resulting text will be chunked according to the settings below

chunk_size.title: Chunk size
chunk_size.description: The maximum character length of each text chunk

chunk_overlap.title: Chunk overlap
chunk_overlap.description: The character overlap between text chunks that are next to each other

dataset_id.title: Dataset ID
dataset_id.description: Dataset ID (when running standalone without integration)
